summary: A new, stand-alone dagger based on a well known Runescape weapon.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=https://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/SkMFU4n.png[/img][/url][/center]
[b]Demonstrations & Reviews[/b]
[center][youtube]B2OpdvR_n5o[/youtube][/center]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/eVVDRuv.jpg[/img]
[b]FEEL FREE TO ADD YOUR OWN SCREENSHOTS![/b]

[b]About[/b]

The Wolfbane is a dagger that was originally from Runescape. It was used to prevent the townsfolk of Canifis from morphing into Werewolves. For Skyrim, I have made it the anti-werewolf weapon. While it is [b]very[/b] weak against everything else, its quite strong against Werewolves and that is its sole purpose.

Both model and textures were created by me using 3ds Max 2011/2014 and Photoshop CS6.

[b][color=#ffff00]What this mod includes:[/color][/b]Â A unique dagger aimed at slaying Werewolves.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Location[/b]

You will find the Wolfbane at a small encampment near Whitewatch Tower, close to Whiterun. The dagger is held by Drezel, with whom you must kill.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Installation:[/b]

Use Nexus Mod Manager

or

Extract the files of the archive to your Skyrim Data Folder

wolfbanedagger.esp
meshes/weapons/wolfbane
textures/weapons/wolfbane

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Uninstall Instructions:[/b]

Remove using Nexus Mod Manager

or

Simply delete the following files/folders:


wolfbanedagger.esp
meshes/weapons/wolfbane
textures/weapons/wolfbane

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Notes:[/b]

The Wolfbane cannot be upgraded or enchanted.

DO NOT MIX AND MATCH FILES. OVERWRITE COMPLETELY.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
If for some reason the files do not work, cause crashes
or any other problems, please do not hesitate to contact me.

All screenshots are taken directly from the game and resized down from 1920x1080 to 1280x720. No other editing has been done.

Thanks and I hope you enjoy this Skyrim Mod!

PS. DO NOT UPLOAD THIS FILE ANYWHERE ELSE!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
